Package database

Class AppointmentDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.ReadWriteDao<Appointment>
      • database.AppointmentDao
  • public class AppointmentDao
extends ReadWriteDao<Appointment>
    DAO providing read/write access to appointments in the database, which it represents in the application as instances of Appointment. It also provides specialized queries for reports and appointment overlap detection.
    Author:
    Joseph T. Lapp

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  AppointmentDao.MonthTypeCount
      POJO for objects returned by getMonthTypeCounts() for the report of appointment counts by appointment month and type.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AppointmentDao

        public AppointmentDao​(java.sql.Connection conn,
                      User user)
               throws DatabaseException
        Constructs an appointment DAO in contexts where a contact cache is NOT already available. It loads a contact cache from the database.
        Parameters:
        conn - An open database connection, which it leaves open
        user - The logged-in use
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - on database error

      • AppointmentDao

        public AppointmentDao​(java.sql.Connection conn,
                      User user,
                      ContactCache contactCache)
               throws DatabaseException
        Constructs an appointment DAO in contexts where a contact cache is already available, sparing the DAO from having to load it.
        Parameters:
        conn - An open database connection, which it leaves open
        user - The logged-in use
        contactCache - The contact cache
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - on database error

      • getMeetingOverlapCount

        public int getMeetingOverlapCount​(long customerId,
                                  java.time.LocalDateTime appointmentStart,
                                  java.time.LocalDateTime appointmentEnd,
                                  long excludedAppointmentId)
                           throws DatabaseException
        Queries the database for the number of appointments in the database whose meeting times overlap with proposed meeting times for a given customer.
        Parameters:
        customerId - ID of customer for whom to look for meeting overlap
        appointmentStart - Proposed start date/time of the meeting
        appointmentEnd - Proposed end date/time of the meeting
        excludedAppointmentId - The ID of the appointment to exclude from checking for overlap, in case the user is modifying an existing appointment; specify 0 when adding a new appointment
        Returns:
        The number of appointments in the database whose meeting times overlap with proposed meeting times for the indicated customer
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - on database error

        public void close()
           throws DatabaseException

      • getUpdateStatement

        protected java.sql.PreparedStatement getUpdateStatement()
